projects.name: Pizza App
projects.description: Order Pizza Like a Pro! This Flutter app leverages BLOC architecture and Firebase Cloud Firestore to deliver a seamless pizza ordering experience.
projects.technology: Flutter . Dart . BLOC . Firebase . Google auth

projects.name: Reddit Clone
projects.description: Dive into Discussions with our Reddit Clone! Built with Flutter, Riverpod, and Firebase, this application replicates the popular Reddit platform, allowing for authentication, content sharing, and cloud storage.
projects.technology: Flutter . Dart . Riverpod . Firebase . Google and Facebook auth

projects.name: Instagram Clone
projects.description: Share Your World with our Instagram Clone! This Flutter app empowers you to connect through shared images, chat with friends, and follow inspiring content, all powered by Riverpod and Firebase.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: Stay Ahead of the Weather! This Flutter app, built with the Bloc pattern, provides real-time weather forecasts for your current location and lets you explore weather conditions in any city.
